summary:
Maddalena - standalone follower UNPB body Optional Total nude CBBE/UNP Skinny/UUNP HDT
You can find her in the Temple of the Divines
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds to your game Maddalena, a standalone follower
You can find her in the Temple of the Divines in Solitude.

[size=4][b][color=#ff0000]Update 28/07/2016           [/color][color=#ffff00]V.3.0 New Face, New Total nude options CBBE/UNP/UUNP[/color][/b][/size]

[b][color=#ff0000][size=4]V. 3.0[/size][/color][/b] [size=4] I wasn't satisfied with her face so I tried to make it better, more beautiful I guess. I also added 3 more Total nude options: CBBE, UNP Skinny,Custom UUNP HDT( warning:unrealistic). See the images and choose your favourite.
[url=http://imgur.com/gmEBCpy][img]http://i.imgur.com/gmEBCpy.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=http://imgur.com/gpWmXyK][img]http://i.imgur.com/gpWmXyK.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=http://imgur.com/ZA5rgqN][img]http://i.imgur.com/ZA5rgqN.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=http://imgur.com/jwHkyMy][img]http://i.imgur.com/jwHkyMy.jpg[/img][/url]
[/size]

[color=#ff0000][size=3][b]Update 16/07/2016
[/b][/size][/color]
[size=4]Added German translation of the mod by user TKHBMVP. Thank you Tom![/size]
[b][color=#ff0000][size=3]Update 13/07/2016[/size][/color][/b]

[size=4][b]Uploaded version 2.0. Fixed the problem with her meshes when nude.[/b][/size]


[color=#1e84cc]Description[/color]

Name: Maddalena
Race: Nord
Class: CombatWarrior2H
Stats: 10-80, she levels with the player
Perks: RestorationExpert75
Marriageable: yes
Voice: FemaleYoungEager
Body: UNPB BBP
Skin: Demoniac - High quality female body texture 4K
Height:1
Weight:1
Armor (not much protective...) it's a mashup of some mods: Blades Bikini, UNP Bondage, SkyHeels, West Wind Combat Series-Assault Armor
Weapon: Daedric Greatsword

[img]http://i.imgur.com/EYYTlGU.jpg[/img]

[color=#1e84cc]Requirements
[/color]
None

[color=#1e84cc]Installation[/color]
Use NMM installer or manually extract Data folder in your Skyrim/Data

[color=#1e84cc]Uninstallation[/color]
Use NMM or remove manually Maddalena.esp and all Maddalena folders in your Textures and Meshes folders

[color=#1e84cc]Permissions[/color]
Don't reupload the mod on other sites without my permission. Thank you.


[color=#1e84cc]Video
[/color]
 Thanks to THeWorldofRipX for the great review

[youtube]dAAFcQgk9mU[/youtube]
